List of publications

See Google Scholar for a full list of publications

Method development

  1. Exact diagonalization: Y. Lu, M. Höppner, O. Gunnarsson, and M. W. Haverkort, “Efficient Real-Frequency Solver for Dynamical Mean-Field Theory”, Phys. Rev. B 90, 085102 (2014); Y. Lu and M. W. Haverkort, “Exact Diagonalization as an Impurity Solver in Dynamical Mean Field Theory”, The European Physical Journal Special Topics 226, 2549 (2017).
  2. Tensor networks: Y. Lu, X. Cao, P. Hansmann, and M. W. Haverkort, “Natural-Orbital Impurity Solver and Projection Approach for Green’s Functions”, Phys. Rev. B 100, 115134 (2019); X. Cao, Y. Lu*, P. Hansmann, and M. W. Haverkort, “Tree Tensor-Network Real-Time Multiorbital Impurity Solver: Spin-Orbit Coupling and Correlation Functions in Sr2RuO4”, Phys. Rev. B 104, 115119 (2021). Xiaodong Cao, Yi Lu, E Miles Stoudenmire, Olivier Parcollet, “Dynamical correlation functions from complex time evolution”, Phys. Rev. B 109, 235110 (2024);
  3. Neural networks and Machine learning: X. Cao, Z. Zhong, Y. Lu, “Vision Transformer Neural Quantum States for Impurity Models”, arXiv 2408.13050 (2024)
